detail_desc: Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped hem with broderie anglaise that is slightly shorter at the sides.
Sleeveless top woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam below the bust and a flare to the hem. Satin lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Knitted gloves with ribbed cuffs, one pair with a print motif on the finger tips.
Short jersey dress with studs, a draped top, narrow shoulder straps and a horizontal tie at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Jersey-lined hood with a small collar and drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and a mesh inner pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening. Narrow trims at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Jersey lining.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains with pendants in various sizes and designs. Adjustable length, 42.5-50.5 cm.
Shorts in a textured-weave cotton blend containing some linen with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and leg pockets.
Straw hat with a fabric band around the brim. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.

Padded bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist, wide waistband with a concealed key pocket, and a zip at the hems.

Shell trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams and waterproof zips. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly with press-studs, and zipped side pockets. Shaped legs with seams at the knees for optimum mobility and reinforced hems with snow flaps and reinforced elastication. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and a front pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Textured metal earrings. Length 5.3 cm.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the front. Pleats at the top, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide, ankle-length legs with creases.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sweetheart neckline with a small frill trim. Buttons and two high slits at the front.
Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
Metal earrings with a hoop pendant. Diameter of pendant 2 cm, length 3.5 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a flap and magnetic fastener, and a narrow shoulder strap at the top. Lined. Size 4x16x23 cm.
Pool shoes in lightly padded imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and fluted soles. Sizes 7-9 also have a heel strap.
Jumper in a soft viscose-blend knit with a V-neck and inset lace section at the back. Long sleeves with a wide lace edge at the end.
Clamdiggers in a cotton Oxford weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Flannel shirt in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with a normal print).
Sturdy, semi-opaque tights that support the tummy and shape the thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 100 denier.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and small frill trims. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a rounded hem.
High-waisted, ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel at the waist containing a concealed key pocket.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in crinkled jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and smocking over the bust. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons down the skirt.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Soft, spacious shopper in imitation leather with two handles, a detachable shoulder strap and magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Size 13x40x40 cm.
Fine-knit tights with extra space for a growing tummy.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length skirt in sturdy, bonded twill with a slight sheen. Tab with a metal buckle at the waist, wrapover with inner buttons, side pockets and an asymmetric hem at the front. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Calf-length kaftan in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise at the hem. Small stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front, and 3/4-length, cuffed puff sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a viscose weave. Large collar with a gathered lace trim, pearly, metal-rimmed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide, gathered peplum at the hem.
Straight-cut shirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Chokers in diffrent styles, one in velvet and two in lace. Metal fasteners. Adjustable length, approx. 30.5-38 cm.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Suede loafers with soft heel caps and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber soles.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbed trim at the neckline, and a rounded hem.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim and dropped shoulders.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Ribbed wool jumper in a straight style with long raglan sleeves.

Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a soft organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Blouse in an airy cotton weave with concealed buttons down the front, a small stand-up collar with a fold-down edge, and pin-tucks at the front. Extra-long puff sleeves lined with tulle at the top to add volume and accentuate the shoulders, and wide, buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a bellows pleat at the back for added width, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with one ear cuff, five non-matching earrings and two hoop earrings that can be worn as a pair. Size from 0.2 cm to 2 cm.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Shorts in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on one leg (normal sequins in size 2-3Y). Covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Loafers in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a decorative tab and metal chain at the front. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace with three heart-shaped pendants in various sizes. The largest heart opens up. Adjustable length.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long sleeves and roll edges.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.

Body in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover bodice. Open back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the hips, a lower jersey section and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft pointelle knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Round-necked dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Press-studs at the neck, long balloon sleeves with ribbing and a gathered seam at the top.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
